title: What Are Clouds Made Of? And Other Questions About The World Around Us
description: Every child's questions presented with simple answers to discover in this interactive book."Why is the sky blue?""What do the birds say when they sing?"Every kid wants to know the answers to these questions. This beautifully illustrated book gives an exciting way to find out the flaps, tabs, and wheels reveal the answers in a way sure to engage children.
author: Geraldine Taylor
